# The `EmbedBitcodePass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> embeds a copy of the module optimized with the provided pass pipeline into a global variable. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::EmbedBitcodePass</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> embeds a copy of the module optimized with the provided pass pipeline into a global variable.
